comment: Nice watch faces but only 31? No digital faces? Cmon! Hardly a store
title: 31 watch faces is a store?

comment: Good

author: Gabi Luden
comment: Beautiful

comment: Superb

author: William Love
comment: Keep to the good work on the watch faces.
title: The best

author: Tick Tock
comment: Thank you

author: Ryan Callihan
comment: These are some seriously nice watchfaces and there are so many. I'm seriously impressed. Really happy with the addition of battery percentage to other faces! Well done :)
title: The best collection of faces on the Play Store

author: Mark Suthard
comment: Looks great but no square options

reply.author: Cmooon
reply.content: Square watch faces are available, but preview is circle ;) btw. Square preview will be available soon.

author: Bruce Watson
comment: Fantastic app and beautiful watch faces. Only problem is that watch faces are not centered on my moto 360, and end up looking ugly, this is particularly obvious when using the smashes face. Have since refunded my purchase, but will happily buy again if this small bug is fixed.

author: Kuba Stanek
comment: Beautiful hi quality watchfaces, great UI. Nice work!

author: IDLE 0095
comment: No weather NO Thank you

reply.author: Cmooon
reply.content: Weather feature will be available soon.

author: ali mustafa
comment: Wonderful minimal watchfaces
title: Ecstatic beauty

author: Łukasz Olszewski
comment: Very beautiful collection of watch faces. In my opinion number one in market :)
title: Awesome

comment: Watch faces are simple and good looking. Management app works well. Not much to say. Use them a lot.
title: Great looking watchfaces

author: Patrick Jones
comment: But besides Browney.. Not a lot of love to brown friendly bands/faces.. Most faces are some variation of black or gray.
title: Love the new faces

author: Nicholas Carvalho
comment: Love the updated faces. Just bought atlanto and it looks great only minor thing could you darken the background a little on atlanto so it looks more like the ambient mode? Other than that great looking faces large free collection and paid ones are worth it
title: Awesome

author: Nicklas Fisker
comment: I need some kind of an option to get the date of the day shown otherwise I just love these faces!
title: Love the looks! But

author: Josue Lopez
comment: One step closer! Translucent notification cards and it would be perfect. IMO of course

reply.author: Cmooon
reply.content:
In current update application the problem will be solved :)

Get new version from market.

title: Very nice watchfaces, but

author: Kenneth Jerney
comment: Nice faces, but when I listen to music it takes up the whole watch face. Can't see the time and listen unless I swipe DIRECTLY on the white card.

reply.author: Cmooon
reply.content: Problem has been resolved, please get new version application from market :)

author: Joseph Pecora
comment: Would love to see a 'Date' option to be displayed.  Hopefully, once out of beta.  Keep up the great work.
title: Really like the selections

author: Gosta Dolc
comment: Great app with some very nice watch-faces!
title: First comment:D

author: Louis Kay
comment: More watch faces please ☺

reply.author: Cmooon
reply.content: No problem, it will be more available soon, please be patient!

author: James Cridland
comment: Some of the watch faces are pretty; but many crash my watch (LGGWR, latest Android build) - including the default on install. Plus, ambient mode is set as pure black and white, and looks poor on a decent OLED screen.
title: Nice but unreliable

author: Jeff Jonez
comment: Lots of cool faces, but expect to pay for anything you like. The 'free' faces are completely locked down, requiring purchase for any level of real customization. TL:DR? Look but don't touch.

author: Lim Zheng Yue
comment: Cheap faces. Similar to the paid version. Zero update. Don't buy

author: Laurence Mark
comment: Does not display steps.

comment: Hiiii
title: Yaaa
